title: People, Pests and Plagues
description: Introduction to the science of entomology, focusing on insect identification, biology, ecology, and interactions with humans. Insect pest and beneficial species, and their role in shaping how we live, work and eat. Not open for degree credit to students majoring in AEPS, CRSC, FRSC, EHS nor WVIT (viticulture concentration). 3 lectures, 1 activity. Fulfills GE B2 & B4.
